Mr. Bennet.name: Mr. Bennet
Mr. Bennet.role: Father of the Bennet family, husband of Mrs. Bennet, a gentleman with a sarcastic and teasing nature

Mrs. Bennet.name: Mrs. Bennet
Mrs. Bennet.role: Mother of the Bennet family, wife of Mr. Bennet, concerned with marrying off her daughters

Mr. Bingley.name: Mr. Bingley
Mr. Bingley.role: Wealthy young gentleman, new resident of Netherfield, amiable and sociable

Elizabeth Bennet.name: Elizabeth Bennet
Elizabeth Bennet.role: Second daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Bennet, intelligent and lively, often called Lizzy

Jane Bennet.name: Jane Bennet
Jane Bennet.role: Eldest daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Bennet, gentle and admired for her beauty

Mary Bennet.name: Mary Bennet
Mary Bennet.role: One of the Bennet daughters, described as a young lady of deep reflection

Catherine Bennet.name: Catherine Bennet
Catherine Bennet.role: One of the Bennet daughters, often called Kitty, concerned with balls and partners

Lydia Bennet.name: Lydia Bennet
Lydia Bennet.role: One of the Bennet daughters, concerned with balls and partners

Mrs. Long.name: Mrs. Long
Mrs. Long.role: Neighbor of the Bennets, described as selfish and hypocritical by Mrs. Bennet

Lady Lucas.name: Lady Lucas
Lady Lucas.role: Neighbor of the Bennets, provides second-hand information about Mr. Bingley

Sir William Lucas.name: Sir William Lucas
Sir William Lucas.role: Neighbor of the Bennets, delighted with Mr. Bingley as reported by Lady Lucas

Mr. Darcy.name: Mr. Darcy
Mr. Darcy.role: Friend of Mr. Bingley, wealthy and proud, initially disliked for his haughty demeanor

Mr. Hurst.name: Mr. Hurst
Mr. Hurst.role: Brother-in-law of Mr. Bingley, husband of the eldest Bingley sister, described as looking the gentleman

Mrs. Hurst.name: Mrs. Hurst
Mrs. Hurst.role: Eldest sister of Mr. Bingley, married to Mr. Hurst, fashionable and proud

Miss Bingley.name: Miss Bingley
Miss Bingley.role: Sister of Mr. Bingley, fashionable and proud, set to live with and manage her brother's household

Miss Lucas.name: Miss Lucas
Miss Lucas.role: Daughter of Sir William and Lady Lucas, danced with Mr. Bingley but not admired by him

Maria Lucas.name: Maria Lucas
Maria Lucas.role: Another daughter of Sir William and Lady Lucas, danced with Mr. Bingley

Miss King.name: Miss King
Miss King.role: A young lady who danced with Mr. Bingley at the assembly
